title: FT: T206 Mathewson Dark Cap PSA 1 - SOLD!
author: jimivintage

posts.post_title: FT: T206 Mathewson Dark Cap PSA 1 - SOLD!
posts.post_content:
Hey folks,

I have an extra t206 Matty Dark Cap available.  Yes, this is the one in the April Pick Up thread.  I decided that I'd rather have another HOFer for my HOF Collection than having 2 of the same guy.  So, if you have something up for grabs from any E or T cards in the $100 - $300 range, please let me know as I'd like to try and make a trade. I might also consider HOF RCs as well (Exhibits, Topps, Bowman, E and T, etc.) Thanks!

Jimi
